A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can only assume anyone who liked this movie has never actually seen the original trilogy.  It's complete shite and Rian Johnson should NEVER be allowed near a franchise film again.  Luke wanted to kill his nephew?  That's an odd character development for the person who risked their life to redeem his father who was literally the worst person in the universe.  And hyperdrive is now a weapon?  Seems like the whole Rebel attack on the Death Star would have gone a lot better with this bit of knowledge.  WTF...
